title: Association football. Pt. 2. Trapping
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional, Football Association and George Sturt
brief_description: Instructional film looking at the skills involved in the game of football (soccer). Demonstrates trapping skills with cushioning, inside and outside of the foot traps, sole and instep traps and trapping on the run. Commentary by Raymond Glendenning.
creator_credit_for_label: Gaumont-British Instructional, Football Association and George Sturt
